title: victim target lists
extract: intended target/victim/destination etc. From Longman Dictionary of Contemporary English intended target/victim/destination etcthe person, thing, result etc that an action is intended to affect or reach It seems likely that General Rogers was the killer's intended victim.
extract_html: intended target/victim/destination etc. From Longman Dictionary of Contemporary English intended target/victim/destination etcthe person, thing, result etc that an action is intended to affect or reach It seems likely that General Rogers was the killer's intended victim.
